statements: DELETE FROM project_files WHERE file_id = 1 AND version_number < 2;
DELETE FROM project_files WHERE project_name = 'Sample Project' AND version_number = 3;
DELETE FROM project_files WHERE version_number IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM version_history WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM project_files WHERE file_name = 'example.txt');
DELETE FROM project_files WHERE project_id = 1 AND file_type = 'PDF';
DELETE FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' AND email = 'admin@example.com';
DELETE FROM project_files WHERE project_id = 1 AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM project_versions WHERE version_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_id NOT IN (SELECT project_id FROM project_versions);
DELETE FROM project_files WHERE project_name = 'Project X';
